PSCT.Base: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 "Malefic" monster from your Extra Deck while "Malefic Paradigm Dragon" is not on the field. If "Malefic World" is not on the field, destroy this card. Once per turn: You can send 1 "Malefic" card from your Deck to the GY; return 1 of your banished Level 8 Synchro Monsters to the Extra Deck, then you can Special Summon that monster from the Extra Deck, also you can only attack with "Malefic" monsters for the rest of this turn.
